lead_paragraph: Southampton will be without Charlie Austin for several weeks after the striker picked up a hamstring injury in Tuesday's 2-0 Premier League defeat at local rivals Bournemouth, manager Ronald Koeman has said.

headline.print_headline: Southampton's Austin Facing Spell on Sidelines With Injury
headline.main: Southampton's Austin Facing Spell on Sidelines With Injury

snippet: Southampton will be without Charlie Austin for several weeks after the striker picked up a hamstring injury in Tuesday's 2-0 Premier League defeat at local rivals Bournemouth, manager Ronald Koeman has said....
